block.name: QT GUI Check Box
block.doc:
TODO This block creates a variable check box. \ Leave the label blank to use the variable id as the label.
A check box selects between two values of similar type. \ Te values do not necessarily need to be of boolean type.
The GUI hint can be used to position the widget within the application. \ The hint is of the form [tab_id@tab_index]: [row, col, row_span, col_span]. \ Both the tab specification and the grid position are optional.
